TopicTitle: I compiled something for the first time

Articles.Content:
And that's what I wanted to share with the world. I'm really happy, because it felt like the ice wall in Game of Thrones.

But in the end it wasn't as difficult as I thought it would be. Downloaded SharpDevelop, adapted the source to my own needs (one word), changed references and click build. It runs in KSP without exceptions!

I still don't understand C# but i've taken a first step.

And the module will feature in my future mod: Electronics.

Congrats!

I can affirm someone can make plugins without have to understand much C#, look at me! . You should give a try to visual studio 2015 community edition (I'm guessing you're in Windows 'cause of Sharpdevelop), makes things easy for me.

Waiting for that mod!

Salud.
